section.title: Upgrade from
section.p:
It is not possible to upgrade your VPNaaS objects to automatically. This is because the
VPNaaS uses OpenSwan and the VPNaaS uses StrongSwan and currently there isn't a clean migration path for the upgrade.

To upgrade VPNaaS:
Delete all VPNaaS objects.
Perform the upgrade.
Recreate the VPNaaS objects.
For information on creating, configuring or troubleshooting of VPNaaS objects, see
